title: Other than infinity where is electric field zero

content.description: The following questions refer to two charges located on the line shown in the figure below, in which the charge at point I is +3q and the charge at point III is +2q. Point II is halfway between points I and III.
content.question: Other than at infinity, the electric field strength is zero at a point on the line in which of the following ranges?

choices.label: None: the field is zero only at infinity.

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
